block.p: BORGWARNER INC., -- Chicago, the No. 2 maker of four-wheel-drive systems in the world, said it would supply those parts for the light trucks of General Motors, Detroit adding about $200 million in annual sales.

DREYER'S GRAND ICE CREAM INC., -- Oakland, Calif., the ice cream maker, said it had agreed to expand its distribution of ice cream of Ben & Jerry's Homemade Inc., South Burlington, Vt. Financial terms were not disclosed.

UNITEDHEALTH GROUP INC., -- Minnetonka, Minn., the nation's No. 2 health insurer, said it would split its shares 2 for 1 to shareholders of record as of Dec. 1 and payable Dec. 22. UnitedHealth will also buy back as many as 16 million shares of its stock.
